trans-unit.source: If given and is positive, it represents the length of the portion of string which is to be replaced. If it is negative, it represents the number of characters from the end of string at which to stop replacing. If it is not given, then it will default to strlen( string ); i.e. end the replacing at the end of string. Of course, if length is zero then this function will have the effect of inserting replace into string at the given offset offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定且为正，则表示要替换的 string 部分的长度。如果为负，则表示从 string 末尾开始要停止替换的字符数。如果未给出，则默认为strlen（ string ）;即在 string 的结尾处结束替换。当然，如果 length 为零，则此函数将具有在给定的 offset 处将 replace 插入到 string 中的作用。

trans-unit.source: If given and is positive, it represents the length of the portion of string which is to be replaced. If it is negative, it represents the number of characters from the end of string at which to stop replacing. If it is not given, then it will default to strlen( string ); i.e. end the replacing at the end of string. Of course, if length is zero then this function will have the effect of inserting replacement into string at the given start offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定且为正，则表示要替换的 string 部分的长度。如果为负，则表示从 string 末尾开始要停止替换的字符数。如果未给出，则默认为strlen（ string ）;即在 string 的结尾处结束替换。当然，如果 length 为零，则此函数将具有在给定的 start 偏移量处将 replacement 插入 string 中的效果。

trans-unit.source: If given three arguments, this function returns a copy of str where all occurrences of each (single-byte) character in from have been translated to the corresponding character in to, i.e., every occurrence of $from[$n] has been replaced with $to[$n], where $n is a valid offset in both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果有三个参数，这个函数返回的副本 str 其中每个（单字节）字符的所有匹配 from 已被翻译成相应的字符 to 的每一次出现，即 $from[$n] 已被替换 $to[$n] ，其中 $n 是两个参数中的有效偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If given three arguments, this function returns a copy of str where all occurrences of each (single-byte) character in from have been translated to the corresponding character in to, i.e., every occurrence of $from[$n] has been replaced with $to[$n], where $n is a valid offset in both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果有三个参数，这个函数返回的副本 str 其中每个（单字节）字符的所有匹配 from 已被翻译成相应的字符 to 的每一次出现，即从[$ N] $已被替换$ to [$ n]，其中$ n是两个参数中的有效偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If given two arguments, the second should be an array in the form array('from' => 'to', ...). The return value is a string where all the occurrences of the array keys have been replaced by the corresponding values. The longest keys will be tried first. Once a substring has been replaced, its new value will not be searched again.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的两个参数，第二应该是一个阵列的形式，阵列（“从” =>“到”，...） 。返回值是一个字符串，其中所有出现的数组键都已被相应的值替换。最长的键将首先尝试。替换子字符串后，将不再搜索其新值。

trans-unit.source: If messages are not received, try using a LF (\n) only. Some Unix mail transfer agents (most notably » qmail) replace LF by CRLF automatically (which leads to doubling CR if CRLF is used). This should be a last resort, as it does not comply with » RFC 2822.
trans-unit.target: 如果未收到消息，请尝试仅使用LF（\ n）。一些Unix邮件传输代理（最著名的是qmail）会自动将CRLF替换为CRLF（如果使用CRLF，则会导致CR翻倍）。这应该是不得已的方法，因为它不符合»RFC 2822的要求。

trans-unit.source: If negative length is passed, iconv_substr() cuts the portion out of string from the offset'th character up to the character that is length characters away from the end of the string. trans-unit.source: If no error handler is set, then PHP will handle any errors that occur according to its configuration. trans-unit.target: 如果未设置错误处理程序，则PHP将处理根据其配置发生的任何错误。报告哪些错误和忽略哪些错误由 error_reporting php.ini指令控制，或者在运行时通过调用error_reporting（）进行控制。强烈建议设置配置指令，但是，由于在开始执行脚本之前可能会发生一些错误。

trans-unit.source: If the PCRE_UNGREEDY option is set (an option which is not available in Perl) then the quantifiers are not greedy by default, but individual ones can be made greedy by following them with a question mark. In other words, it inverts the default behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了PCRE_UNGREEDY选项（Perl中不提供此选项），则默认情况下，量词不是贪婪的，但是可以在单个量词后面加上问号，从而使它们变得贪婪。换句话说，它会反转默认行为。

trans-unit.source: If the assertion is given as a string it will be evaluated as PHP code by assert(). If you pass a boolean condition as assertion, this condition will not show up as parameter to the assertion function which you may have defined with assert_options(). The condition is converted to a string before calling that handler function, and the boolean FALSE is converted as the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 assertion 是以字符串形式给出的，则将由assert（）将其评估为PHP代码。如果将布尔条件作为 assertion 传递，则此条件将不会显示为断言函数的参数，该函数可能已通过assert_options（）定义。在调用该处理函数之前，条件将转换为字符串，并且布尔值 FALSE 将转换为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the assertion is given as a string it will be evaluated as PHP code by assert(). trans-unit.source: If the cut is set to TRUE, the string is always wrapped at or before the specified width. So if you have a word that is larger than the given width, it is broken apart. (See second example). When FALSE the function does not split the word even if the width is smaller than the word width.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cut 设置为 TRUE ，则字符串总是以指定的 width 或之前的宽度包装。因此，如果您输入的字词大于给定的宽度，则会将其分开。（请参见第二个示例）。当为 FALSE 时，即使 width 小于单词宽度，该功能也不会拆分单词。

trans-unit.source: If the cut_long_words is set to true, the string is always wrapped at or before the specified width. So if you have a word that is larger than the given width, it is broken apart. (See second example). When false the function does not split the word even if the width is smaller than the word width.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cut_long_words 设置为 true ，则始终将字符串包装在指定 width 或指定宽度之前。因此，如果您输入的单词大于给定的宽度，则会将其分解。（请参阅第二个示例）。如果为 false ，则即使 width 小于单词宽度，该功能也不会拆分单词。

trans-unit.source: If the initialize argument is TRUE, it tries to configure the DNS base sensibly given your operating system’s default. trans-unit.source: If the output argument is present, then the specified array will be filled with every line of output from the command. Trailing whitespace, such as \n, is not included in this array. Note that if the array already contains some elements, exec() will append to the end of the array. If you do not want the function to append elements, call unset() on the array before passing it to exec().
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 output 参数，则将使用命令的输出的每一行填充指定的数组。尾随空格，例如 \n ，不包含在此数组中。请注意，如果数组已经包含一些元素，则exec（）将追加到数组的末尾。如果您不希望函数附加元素，请在将数组传递给exec（）之前在数组上调用unset （）。

trans-unit.source: If the output argument is present, then the specified array will be filled with every line of output from the command. If you do not want the function to append elements, call unset() on the array before passing it to exec().

trans-unit.target: 如果 precision 是否定的， val 被舍入为 precision 小数点前显著数字，即最接近的倍数 pow(10, -precision) ，例如用于 precision 的-1 val 被舍入到几十，对于 precision 的- 2至数百，等等。

trans-unit.source: If the BLOB was being read, this function returns TRUE on success, if the BLOB was being written to, this function returns a string containing the BLOB id that has been assigned to it by the database. On failure, this function returns FALSE.

trans-unit.source: If the DateInterval object was created by DateTime::diff(), then this is the total number of days between the start and end dates. Otherwise, days will be FALSE.

trans-unit.target: 如果PDOStatement对象是从PDO :: prepare（）返回的，则在您调用PDOStatement :: execute（）之前，无法获得准确的列数。

trans-unit.source: If the PHP directive register_globals is set to on then cookie values will also be made into variables. In our examples below, $TestCookie will exist. It's recommended to use $_COOKIE.
trans-unit.target: 如果将PHP指令register_globals设置为on，则cookie值也将变为变量。在下面的示例中， $TestCookie 将存在。建议使用 $_COOKIE 。

trans-unit.target: 如果将PHP指令register_globals设置为 on ,则cookie值也将变为变量。在下面的示例中， $TestCookie 将存在。建议使用 $_COOKIE 。

trans-unit.source: If the PHP interpreter has been built with ZTS (Zend Thread Safety) enabled, any changes to the current directory made through chdir() will be invisible to the operating system. All built-in PHP functions will still respect the change in current directory; but external library functions called using FFI will not. You can tell whether your copy of PHP was built with ZTS enabled using php -i or the built-in constant PHP_ZTS.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP解释器是在启用ZTS（Zend线程安全性）的情况下构建的，则通过chdir（）对当前目录进行的任何更改对于操作系统都是不可见的。所有内置的PHP函数仍然会尊重当前目录中的更改；但是使用FFI调用的外部库函数不会。您可以判断您的PHP副本是使用php -i启用ZTS还是内置常量 PHP_ZTS 构建的。

trans-unit.source: If the PHP interpreter has been built with ZTS (Zend Thread Safety) enabled, the current working directory returned by getcwd() may be different from that returned by operating system interfaces. External libraries (invoked through FFI) which depend on the current working directory will be affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP解释器是在启用ZTS（Zend线程安全）的情况下构建的，则getcwd（）返回的当前工作目录可能与操作系统接口返回的当前目录不同。依赖于当前工作目录的外部库（通过FFI调用）将受到影响。

trans-unit.source: If the SNMP host rejects the data type, an E_WARNING message like "Warning: Error in packet. Reason: (badValue) The value given has the wrong type or length." is shown. If an unknown or invalid OID is specified the warning probably reads "Could not add variable".
trans-unit.target: 如果SNMP主机拒绝该数据类型,则会出现E_WARNING消息,如 "Warning:数据包中出现错误。原因:(badValue)给定的值有错误的类型或长度。(badValue)给定的值有错误的类型或长度。"显示。如果指定了一个未知或无效的OID,警告可能是 "无法添加变量"。

trans-unit.source: If the SQLSTATE error code is not set or there is no driver-specific error, the elements following element 0 will be set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置SQLSTATE错误代码或没有特定于驱动程序的错误，则元素0之后的元素将设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the SQLSTATE error code is not set or there is no driver-specific error, the elements following element 0 will be set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置SQLSTATE错误代码或没有特定于驱动程序的错误，则元素0之后的元素将设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If the Zookeeper::SEQUENCE flag is set, a unique monotonically increasing sequence number is appended to the path name. The sequence number is always fixed length of 10 digits, 0 padded.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了Zookeeper::SEQUENCE标志,那么一个唯一的单调递增的序列号会附加到路径名中。序列号的长度总是固定的10位数,0填充。

trans-unit.source: If the above example was written with preg_replace() and the e modifier, the code could be easily exploited by passing in a string such as <h1>{${eval($_GET[php_code])}}</h1>. This gave the attacker the ability to execute arbitrary PHP code and as such gave them nearly complete access to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果上面的示例是使用preg_replace（）和 e 修饰符编写的，则可以通过传入诸如 <h1>{${eval($_GET[php_code])}}</h1> 的字符串来轻松利用该代码。这使攻击者能够执行任意PHP代码，从而使他们几乎可以完全访问服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the action code is SQLite3::DELETE and the callback returns SQLite3::IGNORE then the DELETE operation proceeds but the truncate optimization is disabled and all rows are deleted individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作代码为 SQLite3::DELETE ，并且回调返回 SQLite3::IGNORE 则继续执行DELETE操作，但截断优化被禁用，并且所有行均被单独删除。

trans-unit.source: If the action code is SQLite3::READ and the callback returns SQLite3::IGNORE then the prepared statement statement is constructed to substitute a null value in place of the table column that would have been read if SQLite3::OK had been returned. The SQLite3::IGNORE return can be used to deny an untrusted user access to individual columns of a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作代码为 SQLite3::READ 且回调返回 SQLite3::IGNORE 则构造准备好的语句语句以替换 null 值，以代替如果已返回 SQLite3::OK 则将读取的表列。在 SQLite3::IGNORE 的回报可以用来拒绝表的各个列不可信的用户访问。

trans-unit.source: If the archive has entries with the same name, this method, together with RarArchiveforeach iteration and array-like access with numeric indexes, are the only ones to access all the entries (i.e., RarArchive::getEntry() and the rar:// wrapper are insufficient).
trans-unit.target: 如果存档中具有相同名称的条目，则该方法以及RarArchive foreach 迭代和具有数字索引的类数组访问是唯一访问所有条目的方法（即RarArchive :: getEntry（）和 rar:// 包装器）。

trans-unit.source: If the arguments are passed by reference, any changes to the arguments will be reflected in the values returned by this function. As of PHP 7 the current values will also be returned if the arguments are passed by value.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是通过引用传递的,任何对参数的修改都会反映在这个函数返回的值中。在PHP 7中,如果参数是通过值传递的,那么当前值也会被返回。

trans-unit.source: If the array is changed from the callback function (e.g. element added, deleted or unset) the behavior of this function is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组从回调函数中改变了(例如添加、删除或取消设置元素),这个函数的行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: If the array is empty and initial is not passed, array_reduce() returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组为空且未传递 initial ，则array_reduce（）返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the base name ends in suffix, this will be cut.

trans-unit.source: If the call is successful the opened data is returned in this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用成功,打开的数据将在此参数中返回。

trans-unit.source: If the call was interrupted by a signal, sleep() returns a non-zero value. On Windows, this value will always be 192 (the value of the WAIT_IO_COMPLETION constant within the Windows API). On other platforms, the return value will be the number of seconds left to sleep.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫被信号中断，sleep（）将返回非零值。在Windows上，此值将始终为 192 （Windows API中 WAIT_IO_COMPLETION 常量的值）。在其他平台上，返回值将是剩余的睡眠秒数。

trans-unit.source: If the call was interrupted by a signal, sleep() returns a non-zero value. On Windows, this value will always be 192 (the value of the WAIT_IO_COMPLETION constant within the Windows API). On other platforms, the return value will be the number of seconds left to sleep.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用被信号中断，sleep（）将返回一个非零值。在Windows上，此值将始终为192（Windows API中 WAIT_IO_COMPLETION 常数的值）。在其他平台上，返回值将是睡眠的秒数。

trans-unit.source: If the call was successful the signature is returned in signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫成功，则以signature返回 signature 。

trans-unit.source: If the callback accepts a fifth parameter, errcontext, it will be passed an array that points to the active symbol table at the point the error occurred. In other words, errcontext will contain an array of every variable that existed in the scope the error was triggered in. User error handlers must not modify the error context.
trans-unit.target: 如果回调函数接受第五个参数 errcontext ，则会向该数组传递一个数组，该数组指向发生错误时的活动符号表。换句话说， errcontext 将包含在触发错误的作用域中存在的每个变量的数组。用户错误处理程序不得修改错误上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the callback accepts a fourth parameter, errline, it will be passed the line number where the error was raised, as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果回调函数接受第四个参数 errline ，则将整数形式传递给引发错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: If the callback accepts a third parameter, errfile, it will be passed the filename that the error was raised in, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果回调函数接受第三个参数 errfile ，那么它将以字符串形式传递引发错误的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If the called function expects a parameter to be passed by reference, an E_WARNING is now issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果被调用函数希望参数通过引用传递，则现在发出 E_WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: If the caller is a super user, this will also set the effective group id.

trans-unit.source: If the child could be removed the function returns the old child.
trans-unit.target: 如果子代可以被删除,函数返回旧的子代。

trans-unit.source: If the class does not exist, the function returns FALSE and adds an error to the error collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果该类不存在，则该函数返回 FALSE 并将错误添加到错误集合。

trans-unit.source: If the class name is used e.g. in call_user_func() then it can contain some dangerous characters such as ../. It is recommended to not use the user-input in such functions or at least verify the input in __autoload().
trans-unit.target: 如果在例如call_user_func（）中使用了类名，则它可能包含一些危险字符，例如 ../ 。建议不要在此类函数中使用用户输入，或至少在__autoload（）中验证输入。

trans-unit.source: If the command to be executed could not be found, a valid resource is returned. This may seem odd, but makes sense; it allows you to access any error message returned by the shell:

trans-unit.source: If the condition is not a sequence of digits or (R), it must be an assertion. This may be a positive or negative lookahead or lookbehind assertion. Consider this pattern, again containing non-significant white space, and with the two alternatives on the second line:
trans-unit.target: 如果条件不是数字序列或(R),它必须是一个断言。这可能是一个正的或负的lookahead或lookbehind断言。考虑一下这个模式,同样包含非显著的空白,并且在第二行有两个选项。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is satisfied, the yes-pattern is used; otherwise the no-pattern (if present) is used. If there are more than two alternatives in the subpattern, a compile-time error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果满足条件,则使用 "是 "模式;否则使用 "否 "模式(如果存在)。如果子模式中有两个以上的选择,就会出现编译时错误。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is the string (R), it is satisfied if a recursive call to the pattern or subpattern has been made. At "top level", the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件是字符串 (R) ，则可以对模式或子模式进行递归调用。在“最高级别”，条件为假。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is the string (R), it is satisfied if a recursive call to the pattern or subpattern has been made. At "top level", the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件是字符串（R），则可以对模式或子模式进行递归调用。在“顶层”，条件为假。

trans-unit.source: If the context allows leading numeric strings and the string is one, resolve to an int if the leading part of the string is an integer numeric string and fits into the limits of the int type limits (as defined by PHP_INT_MAX), otherwise resolve to a float. Additionally an error of level E_WARNING is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文允许前导数字字符串且字符串为1，则如果字符串的前导部分为整数数字字符串且符合int类型限制（由 PHP_INT_MAX 定义）的限制，则将其解析为int ，否则解析为a漂浮。此外， E_WARNING 引发E_WARNING级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: If the database server successfully prepares the statement, PDO::prepare() returns a PDOStatement object. If the database server cannot successfully prepare the statement, PDO::prepare() returns FALSE or emits PDOException (depending on error handling).
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库服务器成功准备了该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回PDOStatement对象。如果数据库服务器无法成功准备该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回 FALSE 或发出PDOException（取决于错误处理）。

trans-unit.source: If the database server successfully prepares the statement, PDO::prepare() returns a PDOStatement object. If the database server cannot successfully prepare the statement, PDO::prepare() returns false or emits PDOException (depending on error handling).
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库服务器成功准备了该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回PDOStatement对象。如果数据库服务器无法成功准备该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回 false 或发出PDOException（取决于错误处理）。

trans-unit.source: If the database was set to autocommit mode, this function will restore autocommit mode after it has rolled back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库被设置为自动提交模式,该函数将在回滚事务后恢复自动提交模式。

trans-unit.source: If the default event loop is not created, EvLoop::defaultLoop() creates it with the specified parameters. Otherwise, it just returns the object representing previously created instance ignoring all the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果未创建默认事件循环，则EvLoop :: defaultLoop（）使用指定的参数创建它。否则，它将仅返回表示先前创建的实例的对象，而忽略所有参数。

trans-unit.source: If the delay was interrupted by a signal, an associative array will be returned with the components:
trans-unit.target: 如果延时被信号打断,将返回一个关联数组,其中包含元件。

trans-unit.source: If the delimiter needs to be matched inside the pattern it must be escaped using a backslash. If the delimiter appears often inside the pattern, it is a good idea to choose another delimiter in order to increase readability.
trans-unit.target: 如果定界符需要在模式中匹配,则必须使用反斜杠进行转义。如果定界符经常出现在图案中,最好选择另一种定界符,以增加可读性。

trans-unit.source: If the deprecated register_globals directive is set to on then the variables within will also be made available in the global scope of the script. For example, $_POST['foo'] would also exist as $foo.
trans-unit.target: 如果不赞成使用的register_globals指令设置为on，则其中的变量也将在脚本的全局范围内可用。例如， $_POST['foo'] 也将作为 $foo 存在。

trans-unit.source: If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标文件已经存在,它将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If the digit is less than 10, then '0' + digit is returned. Otherwise, the value 'a' + digit - 10 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果数字小于 10 ，则返回'0'+数字。否则，将返回值“ a” +数字-10。

trans-unit.source: If the digit is less than 10, then '0' + digit is returned. Otherwise, the value 'a' + digit - 10 is returned.

trans-unit.source: If the directive magic_quotes_sybase is ON it will completely override magic_quotes_gpc. So even when get_magic_quotes_gpc() returns TRUE neither double quotes, backslashes or NUL's will be escaped. Only single quotes will be escaped. In this case they'll look like: ''

trans-unit.source: If the element hasn't been encoded, and in other words is in plain US-ASCII, the charset property of that element is set to default.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未对元素进行编码，换句话说，使用纯US-ASCII格式，则将该元素的 charset 属性设置为 default 。

trans-unit.source: If the execution context was set previously it is returned. If the execution context was not set previously true is returned. If the request to set the context fails, false is returned, and an E_WARNING raised.

trans-unit.target: 如果文件不存在,就会被创建。

trans-unit.source: If the file is opened for reading, this function is emulated but can be extremely slow. If the file is opened for writing, only forward seeks are supported; gzseek() then compresses a sequence of zeroes up to the new starting position.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开文件进行读取，则会模拟此功能，但速度可能非常慢。如果打开文件进行写入，则仅支持向前搜索；然后gzseek（）将零序列压缩到新的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: If the file previously was larger than this size, the extra data is lost. If the file previously was shorter, it is unspecified whether the file is left unchanged or is extended. In the latter case the extended part reads as zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前的文件大于这个大小,则会丢失多余的数据。如果之前的文件较短,则没有说明文件是保持不变还是扩展。在后一种情况下,扩展部分读作零字节。

trans-unit.source: If the file type is EIO_S_IFCHR or EIO_S_IFBLK then dev specifies the major and minor numbers of the newly created device special file. Otherwise dev ignored. See mknod(2) man page for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件类型为 EIO_S_IFCHR 或 EIO_S_IFBLK ,则dev将指定新创建的设备专用文件的主要和次要编号。否则， dev 忽略。有关详细信息，请参见mknod（2）手册页。

trans-unit.source: If the first and only parameter is an array, max() returns the highest value in that array. If at least two parameters are provided, max() returns the biggest of these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个也是唯一的参数是数组，则max（）返回该数组中的最大值。如果至少提供两个参数，则max（）返回这些值中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If the first and only parameter is an array, min() returns the lowest value in that array. If at least two parameters are provided, min() returns the smallest of these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个也是唯一的参数是数组，则min（）返回该数组中的最小值。如果提供至少两个参数，则min（）返回这些值中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: If the float is beyond the boundaries of integer (usually +/- 2.15e+9 = 2^31 on 32-bit platforms and +/- 9.22e+18 = 2^63 on 64-bit platforms other than Windows), the result is undefined, since the float doesn't have enough precision to give an exact integer result. No warning, not even a notice will be issued when this happens!
trans-unit.target: 如果浮点数超出整数的范围（在32位平台上通常为+/- 2.15e + 9 = 2 ^ 31，而在Windows以外的64位平台上通常为+/- 9.22e + 18 = 2 ^ 63），由于浮点数的精度不足以提供精确的整数结果，因此结果是不确定的。没有警告，发生这种情况甚至不会发出通知！

trans-unit.source: If the float is beyond the boundaries of int (usually +/- 2.15e+9 = 2^31 on 32-bit platforms and +/- 9.22e+18 = 2^63 on 64-bit platforms), the result is undefined, since the float doesn't have enough precision to give an exact int result. No warning, not even a notice will be issued when this happens!
trans-unit.target: 如果浮点数超出int的边界（在32位平台上通常为 +/- 2.15e+9 = 2^31 ，在64位平台上通常为+/- 9.22e +/- 9.22e+18 = 2^63 ），则结果不确定，因为float的精度不足以提供准确的int结果。不会发出警告，甚至在发生这种情况时都不会发出通知！

trans-unit.source: If the given socket is of type AF_INET or AF_INET6, socket_getpeername() will return the peers (remote) IP address in appropriate notation (e.g. 127.0.0.1 or fe80::1) in the address parameter and, if the optional port parameter is present, also the associated port.

trans-unit.target: 如果图像包含任何IFD0数据，则COMPUTED包含条目ByteOrderMotorola，对于小端（英特尔）为0，对于大端（摩托罗拉）字节顺序为1。同样，如果数据类型错误，则COMPUTED和UserComment不再仅包含第一个版权条目。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a truecolor image, this function returns the RGB value of that pixel as integer. Use bitshifting and masking to access the distinct red, green and blue component values:
trans-unit.target: 如果图像是纯色图像,该函数以整数形式返回该像素的RGB值。使用位移和遮罩来访问不同的红、绿、蓝分量值。

trans-unit.source: If the include occurs inside a function within the calling file, then all of the code contained in the called file will behave as though it had been defined inside that function. So, it will follow the variable scope of that function. An exception to this rule are magic constants which are evaluated by the parser before the include occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果include发生在调用文件内的函数内，则被调用文件中包含的所有代码将表现为已在该函数内定义。因此，它将遵循该函数的可变范围。该规则的一个例外是魔术常数，该魔术常数在包含发生之前由解析器评估。

trans-unit.source: If the input string contains an invalid code unit sequence within the given encoding an empty string will be returned, unless either the ENT_IGNORE or ENT_SUBSTITUTE flags are set.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入 string 在给定的 encoding 内包含无效的代码单元序列，则将返回空字符串，除非设置了 ENT_IGNORE 或 ENT_SUBSTITUTE 标志。

trans-unit.source: If the input arrays have the same string keys, then the later value for that key will overwrite the previous one. If, however, the arrays contain numeric keys, the later value will not overwrite the original value, but will be appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入数组具有相同的字符串键，则该键的后一个值将覆盖前一个。但是，如果数组包含数字键，则后面的值将不会覆盖原始值，而是将其附加。

trans-unit.source: If the input arrays have the same string keys, then the values for these keys are merged together into an array, and this is done recursively, so that if one of the values is an array itself, the function will merge it with a corresponding entry in another array too. If, however, the arrays have the same numeric key, the later value will not overwrite the original value, but will be appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的数组有相同的字符串键,那么这些键的值就会被合并到一个数组中,这是以递归的方式进行的,所以如果其中一个值本身就是一个数组,那么该函数也会将其与另一个数组中的相应条目合并。但是,如果这几个数组有相同的数字键,那么后面的值不会覆盖原来的值,而是会被追加。

trans-unit.source: If the input string passed to this function and the final document share the same character set, this function is sufficient to prepare input for inclusion in most contexts of an HTML document. If, however, the input can represent characters that are not coded in the final document character set and you wish to retain those characters (as numeric or named entities), both this function and htmlentities() (which only encodes substrings that have named entity equivalents) may be insufficient. You may have to use mb_encode_numericentity() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给此函数的输入字符串和最终文档共享相同的字符集，则此函数足以准备将输入包含在HTML文档的大多数上下文中。但是，如果输入可以表示未在最终文档字符集中编码的字符，而您希望保留这些字符（作为数字或命名实体），则此函数和htmlentities（）（仅对具有命名实体的子字符串进行编码）等值）可能不足。您可能不得不使用mb_encode_numericentity（）。

trans-unit.source: If the message is too large to fit in the queue, your script will wait until another process reads messages from the queue and frees enough space for your message to be sent. This is called blocking; you can prevent blocking by setting the optional blocking parameter to FALSE, in which case msg_send() will immediately return FALSE if the message is too big for the queue, and set the optional errorcode to MSG_EAGAIN, indicating that you should try to send your message again a little later on.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息太大而无法放入队列中，则脚本将等待，直到另一个进程从队列中读取消息并释放足够的空间以发送消息。这称为阻塞；您可以通过将可选的 blocking 参数设置为 FALSE 来防止阻塞，在这种情况下，如果消息对于队列而言太大，则msg_send（）将立即返回 FALSE ，并将可选的 errorcode MSG_EAGAIN 设置为MSG_EAGAIN，指示您应该尝试发送消息再过一会儿。

trans-unit.source: If the message is too large to fit in the queue, your script will wait until another process reads messages from the queue and frees enough space for your message to be sent. This is called blocking; you can prevent blocking by setting the optional blocking parameter to false, in which case msg_send() will immediately return false if the message is too big for the queue, and set the optional error_code to MSG_EAGAIN, indicating that you should try to send your message again a little later on.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息太大而无法放入队列中，则脚本将等待，直到另一个进程从队列中读取消息并释放足够的空间以发送消息。这称为阻塞；您可以通过将可选的 blocking 参数设置为 false 来防止阻塞，在这种情况下，如果消息对于队列而言太大，则msg_send（）将立即返回 false ，并将可选的 error_code 设置为 MSG_EAGAIN ，指示您应该尝试发送消息再过一会儿。

trans-unit.source: If the optional delimiter is specified, it will also be escaped. This is useful for escaping the delimiter that is required by the PCRE functions. The / is the most commonly used delimiter.

trans-unit.source: If the optional delimiter is specified, it will also be escaped. This is useful for escaping the delimiter that is required by the PCRE functions. The / is the most commonly used delimiter.

trans-unit.source: If the optional errno and errstr arguments are present they will be set to indicate the actual system level error that occurred in the system-level socket(), bind(), and listen() calls. If the value returned in errno is 0 and the function returned false, it is an indication that the error occurred before the bind() call. This is most likely due to a problem initializing the socket. Note that the errno and errstr arguments will always be passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在可选的 errno 和 errstr 参数，则将它们设置为指示在系统级 socket() ， bind() 和 listen() 调用中发生的实际系统级错误。如果在返回的值 errno 是 0 和函数返回 false ，那就是前发生的错误的指示 bind() 调用。这很可能是由于初始化套接字时出现问题。请注意， errno 和 errstr 参数将始终通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: If the optional errno and errstr arguments are present they will be set to indicate the actual system level error that occurred in the system-level socket(), bind(), and listen() calls. If the value returned in errno is 0 and the function returned FALSE, it is an indication that the error occurred before the bind() call. This is most likely due to a problem initializing the socket. Note that the errno and errstr arguments will always be passed by reference.

trans-unit.source: If the optional file and line parameters are set, headers_sent() will put the PHP source file name and line number where output started in the file and line variables.

trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 format 参数设置为非零，则get_headers（）解析响应并设置数组的键。

trans-unit.source: If the optional initial is available, it will be used at the beginning of the process, or as a final result in case the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 initial 是可用的，它将在过程开始时使用，或在数组为空的情况下用作最终结果。

trans-unit.source: If the optional length parameter is specified, the returned array will be broken down into chunks with each being length in length, otherwise each chunk will be one character in length.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 length 参数，则返回的数组将分解为多个块，每个块的 length 为长度，否则每个块的长度为一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If the optional mode parameter is set to COUNT_RECURSIVE (or 1), count() will recursively count the array. This is particularly useful for counting all the elements of a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选 mode 参数设置为 COUNT_RECURSIVE （或1），则count（）将递归地对数组进行计数。这对于计算多维数组的所有元素特别有用。

trans-unit.source: If the optional split_length parameter is specified, the returned array will be broken down into chunks with each being split_length in length, otherwise each chunk will be one character in length.

trans-unit.source: If the optional parameter chunk_size is passed, the buffer will be flushed after any output call which causes the buffer's length to equal or exceed chunk_size. The default value 0 means that the output function will only be called when the output buffer is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了可选参数 chunk_size ，则在任何导致缓冲区长度等于或超过 chunk_size 的输出调用之后，都会刷新缓冲区。默认值 0 表示仅在关闭输出缓冲区时才调用输出函数。

trans-unit.source: If the optional parameter chunk_size is passed, the buffer will be flushed after any output call which causes the buffer's length to equal or exceed chunk_size. The default value 0 means that the output function will only be called when the output buffer is closed.

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with safe_mode = off, then safe_mode may be turned on for the sandbox environment. This setting can not be used to disable safe_mode when it's already enabled in the outer script.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置为safe_mode = off，则可以在沙箱环境中打开safe_mode。如果外部脚本中已启用该设置，则不能使用它禁用safe_mode。

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with safe_mode_gid = on, then safe_mode_gid may be turned off for the sandbox environment. This setting can not be used to enable safe_mode_gid when it's already disabled in the outer script.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置了safe_mode_gid = on，则可以在沙箱环境中关闭safe_mode_gid。如果外部脚本中已经禁用了safe_mode_gid，则不能使用此设置。

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with a safe_mode_include_dir, then a new safe_mode_include_dir may be set for sandbox environments below the currently defined value. safe_mode_include_dir may also be cleared to indicate that the bypass feature is disabled. If safe_mode_include_dir was blank in the outer script, but safe_mode was not enabled, then any arbitrary safe_mode_include_dir may be set while turning safe_mode on.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置了safe_mode_include_dir，则可以为沙箱环境设置一个低于当前定义值的新safe_mode_include_dir。还可以清除safe_mode_include_dir以指示已禁用旁路功能。如果外部脚本中的safe_mode_include_dir为空白，但未启用safe_mode，则可以在打开safe_mode时设置任意的safe_mode_include_dir。

trans-unit.source: If the string is in a single-byte encoding, such as ASCII, ISO-8859, or Windows 1252, this is equivalent to returning the position of a character in the character set's mapping table. However, note that this function is not aware of any string encoding, and in particular will never identify a Unicode code point in a multi-byte encoding such as UTF-8 or UTF-16.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串是单字节编码,如ASCII、ISO-8859或Windows 1252,这相当于返回字符集映射表中一个字符的位置。但是,请注意,这个函数不知道任何字符串编码,特别是不会识别多字节编码中的Unicode码点,如UTF-8或UTF-16。

trans-unit.source: If the string is not numeric, an E_WARNING was raised and the value 0 would be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串不是数字，则引发 E_WARNING 并将返回值 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the string is numeric, resolve to an int if the string is an integer numeric string and fits into the limits of the int type limits (as defined by PHP_INT_MAX), otherwise resolve to a float.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串是数字，则如果字符串是整数数字字符串并且适合int类型限制（由 PHP_INT_MAX 定义）的限制，则将其解析为int ，否则解析为浮点型。

trans-unit.source: If the syntax for a recursive subpattern reference (either by number or by name) is used outside the parentheses to which it refers, it operates like a subroutine in a programming language. An earlier example pointed out that the pattern (sens|respons)e and \1ibility matches "sense and sensibility" and "response and responsibility", but not "sense and responsibility". If instead the pattern (sens|respons)e and (?1)ibility is used, it does match "sense and responsibility" as well as the other two strings. Such references must, however, follow the subpattern to which they refer.
trans-unit.target: 如果递归子模式引用的语法（按数字或按名称）在其所引用的括号之外使用，则其作用类似于编程语言中的子例程。一个较早的示例指出，模式 (sens|respons)e and \1ibility 敏感度）e和\ 1匹配度是“感觉和敏感度”和“响应和责任”，而不是“感觉和责任度”。如果改为使用模式 (sens|respons)e and (?1)ibility 可及性，则它确实与“意义和责任”以及其他两个字符串匹配。但是，此类引用必须遵循其引用的子模式。

If instead the pattern (sens|respons)e and (?1)ibility is used, it does match "sense and responsibility" as well as the other two strings. Such references must, however, follow the subpattern to which they refer.

trans-unit.source: If the third parameter strict is set to TRUE then the array_search() function will search for identical elements in the haystack. This means it will also perform a strict type comparison of the needle in the haystack, and objects must be the same instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果将第三个参数 strict 设置为 TRUE ,则array_search（）函数将在 haystack 中搜索相同的元素。这意味着，它也将执行严格的类型比较的的 needle 在 haystack ，和对象必须是相同的实例。

trans-unit.source: If the type both exists in the union, and the value can be coerced to the type under PHPs existing type checking semantics, then the type is chosen. Otherwise the next type is tried.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型在联合体中都存在,而且根据 PHP 现有的类型检查语义,值可以被强制到该类型,那么就选择该类型。否则就选择下一个类型。

trans-unit.source: If the value is negative, reading will stop the specified number of bytes from the end of the shared memory segment.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为负值,读取将停止从共享内存段末端开始的指定字节数。

trans-unit.target: 如果该值为负数,则起始位置将从共享内存段末端的指定字节数开始。

trans-unit.source: If the value of length is negative, less than, or equal to the length of the input string, no padding takes place, and string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 length 的值为负数，小于或等于输入字符串的长度，则不进行填充，并且将返回 string 。

trans-unit.target: 如果radix的值不是有效的基数，或者digit的值不是指定的基数中的有效数字，则返回空字符（ U+0000 ）。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the first subexpression is TRUE (non-zero), then the second subexpression is evaluated, and that is the result of the conditional expression. Otherwise, the third subexpression is evaluated, and that is the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个子表达式的值为 TRUE （非零），则对第二个子表达式求值，这是条件表达式的结果。否则，将评估第三个子表达式，即该值。

trans-unit.source: If the value returned in errno is 0 and the function returned false, it is an indication that the error occurred before the connect() call. This is most likely due to a problem initializing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值 errno 为 0 和函数返回 false ，那就是前发生的错误指示 connect() 的调用。这很可能是由于初始化套接字时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: If there are functions defined in the included file, they can be used in the main file independent if they are before return or after. If the file is included twice, PHP 5 issues fatal error because functions were already declared, while PHP 4 doesn't complain about functions defined after return. It is recommended to use include_once instead of checking if the file was already included and conditionally return inside the included file.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含文件中定义了函数，则它们可以在返回之前或之后独立用于主文件。如果文件被两次包含，PHP 5会发出致命错误，因为已经声明了函数，而PHP 4并没有抱怨return之后定义的函数。建议使用include_once而不是检查文件是否已包含并有条件地返回到包含的文件中。

trans-unit.source: If there are functions defined in the included file, they can be used in the main file independent if they are before return or after. If the file is included twice, PHP will raise a fatal error because the functions were already declared. It is recommended to use include_once instead of checking if the file was already included and conditionally return inside the included file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在包含的文件中定义了函数，则它们可以在返回之前或之后独立地在主文件中使用。如果文件被两次包含，PHP将引发致命错误，因为函数已被声明。建议使用include_once而不是检查文件是否已包含并有条件地返回到包含的文件中。

trans-unit.source: If there are less than count bytes available, return as many as are available. If no more data is available, return either FALSE or an empty string.

trans-unit.source: If there must be multiple autoload functions, spl_autoload_register() allows for this. It effectively creates a queue of autoload functions, and runs through each of them in the order they are defined. By contrast, __autoload() may only be defined once.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须有多个自动加载功能，则spl_autoload_register（）允许这样做。它有效地创建了自动加载功能队列，并按照定义的顺序遍历每个功能。相反，__autoload（）只能定义一次。

trans-unit.source: If this callback is set, then Yar will call this callback after all calls are sent and before any response return, with a $callinfo NULL.

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritance, calling the parent read method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefore invoke the associated internal callback. This allows the method to be overridden and or intercepted and filtered (for example, decrypting $data value returned by the parent read method).
trans-unit.target: 如果通过继承扩展此类，则调用父 read 方法将为此方法调用包装器，因此将调用关联的内部回调。这允许方法被覆盖和/或被拦截和过滤（例如，解密父 read 方法返回的 $data 值）。

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent close method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefor invoke the associated internal callback. This allows the method to be overidden and or intercepted.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过继承扩展此类，则调用父 close 方法将为此方法调用包装器，并因此调用关联的内部回调。这样可以忽略和/或拦截该方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果通过继承扩展此类，则调用父 destroy 方法将为此方法调用包装器，并因此调用关联的内部回调。这使得该方法可以被忽略和/或拦截和过滤。

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent gc method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefore invoke the associated internal callback. This allows this method to be overridden and or intercepted and filtered.

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent open method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefor invoke the associated internal callback. This allows this method to be overidden and or intercepted and filtered.

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent read method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefor invoke the associated internal callback. This allows the method to be overidden and or intercepted and filtered (for example, decrypting $data value returned by the parent read method).
trans-unit.target: 如果通过继承扩展此类，则调用父 read 方法将为此方法调用包装器，并因此调用关联的内部回调。这使得该方法可以被重写和/或拦截和过滤（例如，解密父 read 方法返回的 $data 值）。

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent write method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefor invoke the associated internal callback. This allows this method to be overidden and or intercepted and filtered (for example, encrypting the $data value before sending it to the parent write method).
trans-unit.target: 如果通过继承扩展此类，则调用父 write 方法将为此方法调用包装器，并因此调用关联的内部回调。这使该方法可以被重写和/或拦截和过滤（例如，在将 $data 值发送给父 write 方法之前对其进行加密）。

trans-unit.source: If this class is extended by inheritiance, calling the parent write method will invoke the wrapper for this method and therefore invoke the associated internal callback. This allows this method to be overridden and or intercepted and filtered (for example, encrypting the $data value before sending it to the parent write method).

trans-unit.source: If this deprecated modifier is set, preg_replace() does normal substitution of backreferences in the replacement string, evaluates it as PHP code, and uses the result for replacing the search string. Single quotes, double quotes, backslashes (\) and NULL chars will be escaped by backslashes in substituted backreferences.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此不建议使用的修饰符，则preg_replace（）会对替换字符串中的反向引用进行常规替换，将其评估为PHP代码，并使用结果替换搜索字符串。单引号，双引号，反斜杠（ \ ）和NULL字符将由替换的反引用中的反斜杠转义。

trans-unit.source: If this deprecated modifier is set, preg_replace() does normal substitution of backreferences in the replacement string, evaluates it as PHP code, and uses the result for replacing the search string. Single quotes, double quotes, backslashes (\) and NULL chars will be escaped by backslashes in substituted backreferences.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此不建议使用的修饰符，则preg_replace（）会对替换字符串中的反向引用进行常规替换，将其评估为PHP代码，并使用结果替换搜索字符串。单引号，双引号，反斜杠（\）和NULL字符将由替换的反引用中的反斜杠转义。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is passed, for every occurring match the appendant string offset (in bytes) will also be returned. Note that this changes the value of matches into an array of arrays where every element is an array consisting of the matched string at offset 0 and its string offset into subject at offset 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了此标志，则对于每次发生的匹配，还将返回附加字符串偏移量（以字节为单位）。注意这改变的值 matches ，其中每个元素是在由匹配的字符串的数组到数组的数组偏移 0 和它的字符串偏移量 subject 在偏移 1 。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is passed, for every occurring match the appendant string offset will also be returned. Note that this changes the value of matches into an array where every element is an array consisting of the matched string at offset 0 and its string offset into subject at offset 1.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is passed, unmatched subpatterns are reported as NULL; otherwise they are reported as an empty string.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, for every occurring match the appendant string offset will also be returned. Note that this changes the return value in an array where every element is an array consisting of the matched string at offset 0 and its string offset into subject at offset 1.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, for every occurring match the appendant string offset will also be returned. Note that this changes the return value in an array where every element is an array consisting of the matched string at offset 0 and its string offset into subject at offset 1.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, only non-empty pieces will be returned by preg_split().
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此标志，则preg_split（）将仅返回非空片段。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, parenthesized expression in the delimiter pattern will be captured and returned as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个标志,定界符模式中的小括号表达式也会被捕获并返回。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, you are responsible for raising errors using trigger_error() during opening of the stream. If this flag is not set, you should not raise any errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此标志，则您有责任在流打开期间使用trigger_error（）引发错误。如果未设置此标志，则不应引发任何错误。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, your wrapper should not raise any errors. If this flag is not set, you are responsible for reporting errors using the trigger_error() function during stating of the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此标志，则包装程序不应引发任何错误。如果未设置此标志，则您有责任在路径声明期间使用trigger_error（）函数报告错误。

trans-unit.source: If this flag used(or the program runs setuid or setgid), libev won't look at the environment variable LIBEV_FLAGS . Otherwise(by default), LIBEV_FLAGS will override the flags completely if it is found. Useful for performance tests and searching for bugs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了此标志（或者程序运行setuid或setgid）， libev 将不会查看环境变量 LIBEV_FLAGS 。否则（默认情况下），如果找到 LIBEV_FLAGS ,它将完全覆盖这些标志。对于性能测试和搜索错误很有用。

trans-unit.source: If this flag used(or the program runs setuid or setgid), libev won't look at the environment variable LIBEV_FLAGS . Otherwise(by default), LIBEV_FLAGS will override the flags completely if it is found. Useful for performance tests and searching for bugs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了此标志（或者程序运行setuid或setgid），libev将不会查看环境变量 LIBEV_FLAGS 。否则（默认情况下），如果找到 LIBEV_FLAGS ,它将完全覆盖这些标志。对于性能测试和搜索错误很有用。

trans-unit.source: If this format specifier is present, trailing data in the string will not cause an error, but a warning instead
trans-unit.target: 如果这个格式指定符存在,字符串中的尾部数据将不会导致错误,而是一个警告。

trans-unit.source: If this function encounters an error, the possible return values are:
trans-unit.target: 如果该函数遇到错误,可能的返回值为:。

trans-unit.source: If this function is called from the outermost scope of a file which has been included by calling include or require from within a function in the calling file, it now generates a warning and returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果从已从调用文件中的函数内调用include或require包含的文件的最外层范围调用此函数，则它将生成警告并返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If this function is called from the outermost scope of a file which has been included by calling include or require from within a function in the calling file, it now generates a warning and returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果从调用文件中的函数内部调用include或require包含的文件的最外层范围调用此函数，则它现在会生成警告并返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If this function is called without arguments, it returns the version of the GeoIP Free Country Edition.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此函数时没有参数,则返回GeoIP免费国家版的版本。

trans-unit.source: If this function return 0 operation will continue, other value it will be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该函数返回0,操作将继续,其他值将被取消。

trans-unit.source: If this function returns 0, a is definitely not prime. If it returns 1, then a is "probably" prime. If it returns 2, then a is surely prime.
trans-unit.target: 如果此函数返回0，则 a 绝对不是素数。如果返回1，则 a 是“可能”素数。如果返回2，然后 a 肯定是素数。

trans-unit.source: If this function returns 0, num is definitely not prime. If it returns 1, then num is "probably" prime. If it returns 2, then num is surely prime.
trans-unit.target: 如果此函数返回0，则 num 绝对不是素数。如果返回1，则 num 是“可能”质数。如果返回2，则 num 肯定是质数。

trans-unit.source: If this is TRUE it will replace matching fields in the destination document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，它将替换目标文档中的匹配字段。

trans-unit.source: If this is TRUE then fields with the same name in the destination document will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ,则目标文档中具有相同名称的字段将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If this is true it will replace matching fields in the destination document.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 true ，它将替换目标文档中的匹配字段。

trans-unit.source: If this modifier is set, a dollar metacharacter in the pattern matches only at the end of the subject string. Without this modifier, a dollar also matches immediately before the final character if it is a newline (but not before any other newlines). This modifier is ignored if m modifier is set. There is no equivalent to this modifier in Perl.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此修饰符，则模式中的美元元字符仅在主题字符串的末尾匹配。如果没有此修饰符，则如果美元是换行符，则美元也会紧接在最后一个字符之前匹配（但不匹配任何其他换行符）。如果设置了m修饰符，则忽略该修饰符。在Perl中没有与此修饰符等效的东西。

trans-unit.source: If this modifier is set, a dot metacharacter in the pattern matches all characters, including newlines. Without it, newlines are excluded. This modifier is equivalent to Perl's /s modifier. A negative class such as [^a] always matches a newline character, independent of the setting of this modifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个修饰符,则图案中的点元字符将匹配所有字符,包括换行符。如果不设置这个修饰符,则会排除换行符。这个修饰符相当于 Perl 的 /s 修饰符。负类,如 [^a]总是匹配换行符,与这个修饰符的设置无关。

trans-unit.source: If this modifier is set, letters in the pattern match both upper and lower case letters.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个修饰符,图案中的字母就会与大写和小写字母相匹配。

trans-unit.source: If this modifier is set, the pattern is forced to be "anchored", that is, it is constrained to match only at the start of the string which is being searched (the "subject string"). This effect can also be achieved by appropriate constructs in the pattern itself, which is the only way to do it in Perl.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个修饰符,模式就会被强制 "锚定",也就是说,它被限制只在被搜索的字符串("主题字符串")的开始处进行匹配。这种效果也可以通过模式本身的适当构造来实现,这也是Perl中唯一的方法。

trans-unit.source: If this modifier is set, whitespace data characters in the pattern are totally ignored except when escaped or inside a character class, and characters between an unescaped # outside a character class and the next newline character, inclusive, are also ignored. This is equivalent to Perl's /x modifier, and makes it possible to include commentary inside complicated patterns. Note, however, that this applies only to data characters. Whitespace characters may never appear within special character sequences in a pattern, for example within the sequence (?( which introduces a conditional subpattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个修饰符,那么模式中的空白数据字符就会被完全忽略,除非被转义或在一个字符类中,而在一个字符类外的未转义的#和下一个换行字符之间的字符,也会被忽略。这相当于Perl的/x修饰符,使得在复杂的模式中包含注释成为可能。但请注意,这只适用于数据字符。虚位字符永远不能出现在模式中的特殊字符序列中,例如在序列(? 引入条件子模式的(?

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the connection listener closes its underlying socket when the EventListener object is freed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此选项，则在释放EventListener对象时，连接侦听器将关闭其基础套接字。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the connection listener sets the close-on-exec flag on the underlying listener socket. See platform documentation for fcntl and FD_CLOEXEC for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此选项，则连接侦听器将在基础侦听器套接字上设置close-on-exec标志。有关更多信息，请参见 fcntl 和 FD_CLOEXEC 的平台文档。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the connection listener sets the close-on-exec flag on the underlying listener socket. See platform documentation for fcntl and FD_CLOEXEC for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此选项，则连接侦听器会在基础侦听器套接字上设置close-on-exec标志。有关更多信息，请参见fcntl和 FD_CLOEXEC 的平台文档。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not set or set to TRUE, duplicate keys will be overwritten. The last value with a given key will be in the returned array. Set this paramater to FALSE to get all the values in any case.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数未设置或设置为 TRUE ，则重复的键将被覆盖。具有给定键的最后一个值将位于返回的数组中。在任何情况下，将此参数设置为 FALSE 即可获取所有值。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not set or set to true, duplicate keys will be overwritten. The last value with a given key will be in the returned array. Set this parameter to false to get all the values in any case.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数未设置或设置为 true ，则重复的键将被覆盖。具有给定键的最后一个值将在返回的数组中。将此参数设置为 false 可以在任何情况下获取所有值。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted as per the second signature, points must have an even number of elements, and num_points is assumed to be count($points)/2.
trans-unit.target: 如果根据第二个签名省略此参数，则 points 必须具有偶数个元素，并且 num_points 被假定为 count($points)/2 。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is set, it will set the INTERNALDATE on the appended message. The parameter should be a date string that conforms to the rfc2060 specifications for a date_time value.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个参数,将在附加的消息上设置INTERNALDATE。该参数应该是符合rfc2060规范的date_time值的日期字符串。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter set to FALSE, string class name as object is not allowed. This also prevents from calling autoloader if the class doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数设置为 FALSE ，则不允许将字符串类名称作为 object 。如果该类不存在，这也可以防止调用autoloader。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter set to false, string class name as object is not allowed. This also prevents from calling autoloader if the class doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数设置为 false ，则不允许将字符串类名称作为 object 。如果该类不存在，这也可以防止调用autoloader。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter set to false, string class name as object is not allowed. This also prevents from calling autoloader if the class doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数设置为false，则不允许将字符串类名称作为 object 。如果该类不存在，这也可以防止调用autoloader。

trans-unit.source: If this rule is broken and the closing identifier is not "clean", it will not be considered a closing identifier, and PHP will continue looking for one. If a proper closing identifier is not found before the end of the current file, a parse error will result at the last line.
trans-unit.target: 如果这条规则被破坏,并且关闭标识符不 "干净",它将不被认为是一个关闭标识符,PHP将继续寻找一个。如果在当前文件结束前没有找到合适的结束标识符,那么在最后一行会产生一个解析错误。

trans-unit.source: If true increase the contrast, if false decrease the contrast.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真则增加对比度,如果为假则减少对比度。

trans-unit.source: If true, spl_autoload_register() will prepend the autoloader on the autoload queue instead of appending it.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则spl_autoload_register（）会将自动加载器放在自动加载队列的前面，而不是附加它。

trans-unit.source: If true, Solr includes the number of groups that have matched the query in the results.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,Solr会在结果中包含与查询匹配的组数。

trans-unit.source: If true, Subversion will recurse into already versioned directories in order to add unversioned files that may be hiding in those directories. Default is false
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，Subversion将递归到已经版本化的目录中，以便添加可能隐藏在那些目录中的未版本化文件。默认为 false

trans-unit.source: If true, and a Closure was provided as the value, the Closure will be executed in place of the original function.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true,并且提供了一个Closure作为值,那么Closure将代替原来的函数被执行。

trans-unit.source: If true, combine as magnitude / phase pair otherwise a real / imaginary image pair.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则组合为幅值/相位对,否则为实像/虚像对。

trans-unit.source: If true, facet counts are based on the most relevant document of each group matching the query. The server default value is false. group.truncate parameter
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,facet计数是基于匹配查询的每个组的最相关文档。服务器默认值为false。 group.truncate参数

trans-unit.source: If true, return as magnitude / phase pair otherwise a real / imaginary image pair.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,返回幅度/相位对,否则返回实像/虚像对。

trans-unit.source: If true, return the raw characters of the indexed term, regardless of if it is human readable
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,返回索引项的原始字符,不管它是否可被人读。

trans-unit.source: If true, the arguments will be converted to canonical form before matching.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,参数将在匹配前被转换为规范形式。

trans-unit.source: If true, the result of the first field grouping command is used as the main result list in the response, using group.format=simple.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则在响应中使用group.format=simple,将第一条字段分组命令的结果作为主结果列表。

trans-unit.source: If two Traits insert a method with the same name, a fatal error is produced, if the conflict is not explicitly resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个Traits插入了一个名称相同的方法,如果冲突没有被明确解决,就会产生一个致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: If two members compare as equal, their relative order in the sorted array is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个成员比较相等,那么它们在排序数组中的相对顺序是未定义的。

trans-unit.target: 如果结果中的两列或多列具有相同的字段名,则最后一列将优先并覆盖前面的数据。为了访问具有相同名称的多列,必须使用行的数字索引版本。

trans-unit.source: If two or more columns of the result have the same field names, the last column will take precedence. To access the other column(s) of the same name, you either need to access the result with numeric indices by using mysqli_fetch_row() or add alias names.

trans-unit.source: If yaf.library is not configured, then the global library directory is assumed to be the local library directory. in that case, all autoloading will look for local library directory. But if you want your Yaf application be strong, then always register your own classes as local classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有配置yaf.library,那么全局library目录就会被认为是本地library目录,在这种情况下,所有的自动加载都会寻找本地library目录。但是如果你想让你的Yaf应用变得强大,那么一定要把自己的类注册为本地类。

trans-unit.source: If you append the string //TRANSLIT to to_encoding transliteration is activated. This means that when a character can't be represented in the target charset, it can be approximated through one or several similarly looking characters. If you append the string //IGNORE, characters that cannot be represented in the target charset are silently discarded. Otherwise, E_NOTICE is generated and the function will return false.
trans-unit.target: 如果将字符串 //TRANSLIT 附加到 to_encoding ,则会激活音译。这意味着当一个字符不能在目标字符集中表示时，可以通过一个或几个外观相似的字符来近似。如果附加字符串 //IGNORE ，则在目标字符集中无法表示的字符将被静默丢弃。否则，将生成 E_NOTICE ，并且该函数将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: If you append the string //TRANSLIT to out_charset transliteration is activated. This means that when a character can't be represented in the target charset, it can be approximated through one or several similarly looking characters. If you append the string //IGNORE, characters that cannot be represented in the target charset are silently discarded. Otherwise, E_NOTICE is generated and the function will return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果将字符串// TRANSLIT附加到 out_charset ,则会激活音译。这意味着当一个字符不能在目标字符集中表示时，可以通过一个或几个外观相似的字符来近似。如果附加字符串// IGNORE，则在目标字符集中无法表示的字符将被静默丢弃。否则，将生成 E_NOTICE ，并且该函数将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If you are experiencing problems with reading and writing to files and you're using the server module version of PHP, remember to make sure that the files and directories you're using are accessible to the server process.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在读写文件时遇到问题,而且你使用的是 PHP 的服务器模块版本,记得要确保你使用的文件和目录是可以被服务器进程访问的。

trans-unit.source: If you are for example storing the data in a MySQL database remember that varchar fields automatically have trailing spaces removed during insertion. As encrypted data can end in a space (ASCII 32), the data will be damaged by this removal. Store data in a tinyblob/tinytext (or larger) field instead.
trans-unit.target: 例如,如果你是在MySQL数据库中存储数据,请记住,varchar字段在插入过程中会自动去除尾部的空格。由于加密数据可能以空格(ASCII 32)结尾,数据将被删除。将数据存储在 tinyblob/tinytext(或更大)字段中。

trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是PHP 5.3.0或更高版本，则应使用本机匿名函数。

trans-unit.source: If you are using fast-cgi or cgi then the parameter passed to the function is the value of the $_SERVER['PATH_INFO'] variable. Otherwise, the parameter passed to the function is the value of the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是fast-cgi或cgi，则传递给该函数的参数是 $_SERVER['PATH_INFO'] 变量的值。否则，传递给函数的参数是 $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If you are using fast-cgi or cgi then the parameter passed to the function is the value of the $_SERVER['PATH_INFO'] variable. Otherwise, the parameter passed to the function is the value of the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是fast-cgi或cgi，则传递给该函数的参数为 $_SERVER['PATH_INFO'] 变量的值。否则，传递给函数的参数是 $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If you are using plain variables, you don't have to worry about this. But if you are using arrays with indices you usually expect the order of the indices in the array the same you wrote in the list() from left to right, which is not the case in PHP 5, as it's assigned in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是普通变量，则不必为此担心。但是，如果您使用带有索引的数组，则通常期望数组中索引的顺序与您在list（）中从左到右所写的顺序相同，在PHP 5中不是这种情况，因为它以相反的顺序分配。

trans-unit.source: If you are using such a pattern with subject strings that do not contain newlines, the best performance is obtained by setting PCRE_DOTALL, or starting the pattern with ^.* to indicate explicit anchoring. That saves PCRE from having to scan along the subject looking for a newline to restart at.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用与不包含换行符主题串这样的模式，通过设置获得最佳的性能PCRE_DOTALL，或开始^格局。*表示明确的锚固。这样可以避免PCRE不必扫描对象以寻找换行符重新开始。

trans-unit.source: If you are using this function to build SQL statements, you are strongly recommended to use PDO::prepare() to prepare SQL statements with bound parameters instead of using PDO::quote() to interpolate user input into an SQL statement. Prepared statements with bound parameters are not only more portable, more convenient, immune to SQL injection, but are often much faster to execute than interpolated queries, as both the server and client side can cache a compiled form of the query.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此函数构建SQL语句，则强烈建议您使用PDO :: prepare（）来准备带有绑定参数的SQL语句，而不是使用PDO :: quote（）来将用户输入插值到SQL语句中。具有绑定参数的预备语句不仅更可移植，更方便，不受SQL注入的影响，而且执行起来通常比插值查询快得多，因为服务器端和客户端都可以缓存查询的编译形式。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a reference to a variable declared global inside a function, the reference will be visible only inside the function. You can avoid this by using the $GLOBALS array.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引用分配给在函数内部声明为 global 变量的变量，则该引用仅在函数内部可见。您可以通过使用 $GLOBALS 数组来避免这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a reference to a variable declared global inside a function, the reference will be visible only inside the function. You can avoid this by using the $GLOBALS array.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引用分配给在函数内部声明为全局变量的变量，则该引用仅在函数内部可见。您可以通过使用 $GLOBALS 数组来避免这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to a variable with references in a foreach statement, the references are modified too.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用foreach语句中的引用为变量赋值，则引用也会被修改。

trans-unit.source: If you assign, pass, or return an undefined variable by reference, it will get created.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过引用分配、传递或返回一个未定义的变量,它将被创建。

trans-unit.source: If you compare a number with a string or the comparison involves numerical strings, then each string is converted to a number and the comparison performed numerically. These rules also apply to the switch statement. The type conversion does not take place when the comparison is === or !== as this involves comparing the type as well as the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果将数字与字符串进行比较，或者比较涉及数字字符串，则每个字符串都将转换为数字，然后以数字方式进行比较。这些规则也适用于switch语句。当比较===或！==时，不会进行类型转换，因为这涉及比较类型和值。

trans-unit.source: If you created the image from a file, only colors used in the image are resolved. Colors present only in the palette are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果您从文件中创建图像,则只解析图像中使用的颜色。只存在于调色板中的颜色不会被解析。

trans-unit.source: If you declare a property using var instead of one of public, protected, or private, then PHP 5 will treat the property as if it had been declared as public.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 var 而不是 public ， protected 或 private 声明属性，则PHP 5将把该属性视为已声明为 public 。

trans-unit.source: If you declare a property using var instead of one of public, protected, or private, then PHP 5 will treat the property as if it had been declared as public.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用var而不是public，protected或private声明属性，则PHP 5将把该属性视为已声明为public。

trans-unit.source: If you do not fetch all of the data in a result set before issuing your next call to PDO::query(), your call may fail. Call PDOStatement::closeCursor() to release the database resources associated with the PDOStatement object before issuing your next call to PDO::query().
trans-unit.target: 如果在下一次调用PDO :: query（）之前未获取结果集中的所有数据，则调用可能会失败。在发出对PDO :: query（）的下一个调用之前，请调用PDOStatement :: closeCursor（）释放与PDOStatement对象关联的数据库资源。

trans-unit.source: If you do not name an element, numeric indices starting from 1 are used. Be aware that if you have more than one unnamed element, some data is overwritten because the numbering restarts from 1 for each element.
trans-unit.target: 如果未命名元素，则使用从 1 开始的数字索引。请注意，如果您有多个未命名元素，则某些数据将被覆盖，因为每个元素的编号均从 1 重新开始。

trans-unit.source: If you do not name an element, numeric indices starting from 1 are used. Be aware that if you have more than one unnamed element, some data is overwritten because the numbering restarts from 1 for each element.
trans-unit.target: 如果未命名元素，则使用从1开始的数字索引。请注意，如果您有多个未命名元素，则某些数据将被覆盖，因为每个元素的编号均从1重新开始。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the 'b' flag when working with binary files, you may experience strange problems with your data, including broken image files and strange problems with \r\n characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用二进制文件时未指定'b'标志，则数据可能会遇到奇怪的问题，包括损坏的图像文件和带有\ r \ n字符的奇怪问题。

trans-unit.source: If you don't need fancy replacing rules (like regular expressions), you should always use this function instead of preg_replace().
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要花哨的替换规则（如正则表达式），则应始终使用此函数代替preg_replace（）。

trans-unit.source: If you don't need fancy replacing rules (like regular expressions), you should use this function instead of preg_replace().
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要花哨的替换规则（如正则表达式），则应使用此函数而不是preg_replace（）。

trans-unit.source: If you don't need the power of regular expressions, you can choose faster (albeit simpler) alternatives like explode() or str_split().
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要正则表达式，可以选择更快（虽然更简单）的替代方法，例如explode（）或str_split（）。

trans-unit.source: If you find yourself using this function all the time, a much better way to define the encoding is to set ps.default_encoding in the configuration file to point to the right encoding file and all fonts you load will automatically have the right encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果您发现自己一直在使用此功能，则定义编码的更好方法是在配置文件中将ps.default_encoding设置为指向正确的编码文件，并且加载的所有字体将自动具有正确的编码。

trans-unit.source: If you get some error like "arithmetic exception, numeric overflow, or string truncation. Cannot transliterate character between character sets" (this occurs when you try use some character with accents) when using this and after ibase_query() you must set the character set (i.e. ISO8859_1 or your current character set).
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用此方法时以及在ibase_query（）之后遇到诸如“算术异常，数字溢出或字符串截断。无法在字符集之间音译字符”（当您尝试使用带有重音符号的字符时发生这种错误）的错误，则必须设置字符集（即ISO8859_1或您当前的字符集）。

trans-unit.source: If you get some error like "arithmetic exception, numeric overflow, or string truncation. Cannot transliterate character between character sets" (this occurs when you try use some character with accents) when using this and after ibase_query() you must set the character set (i.e. ISO8859_1 or your current character set).
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用此方法时以及在ibase_query（）之后遇到诸如“算术异常，数字溢出或字符串截断。无法在字符集之间音译字符”（当您尝试使用带有重音符号的字符时发生这种错误）的错误，则必须设置字符集（即ISO8859_1或您当前的字符集）。

trans-unit.source: If you have cached data in your stream but not yet stored it into the underlying storage, you should do so now.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经在流中缓存了数据,但还没有将其存储到底层存储中,您现在就应该这样做。

trans-unit.source: If you have defined a init() method in your custom controller, it will be called as long as the controller was instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在自定义控制器中定义了init()方法,只要控制器被实例化,它就会被调用。

trans-unit.source: If you have opened the file in append ("a" or "a+") mode, any data you write to the file will always be appended, regardless of the file pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 如果你以追加("a "或 "a+")模式打开文件,你写入文件的任何数据都将被追加,无论文件指针的位置如何。

trans-unit.source: If you have opened the file in append (a or a+) mode, any data you write to the file will always be appended, regardless of the file position, and the result of calling fseek() will be undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以append（ a 或 a+ ）模式打开文件，则无论文件位置如何，都将始终追加写入文件的任何数据，并且调用fseek（）的结果将是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: If you have opened the file in append (a or a+) mode, any data you write to the file will always be appended, regardless of the file position, and the result of calling fseek() will be undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以append（a或a +）模式打开文件，则无论文件位置如何，都将始终追加写入文件的任何数据，并且调用fseek（）的结果将是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: If you have set a custom error handler function with set_error_handler() then it will still get called, but this custom error handler can (and should) call error_reporting() which will return 0 when the call that triggered the error was preceded by an @.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已使用set_error_handler（）设置了自定义错误处理函数，则仍会调用该函数，但是此自定义错误处理函数可以（并且应该）调用error_reporting（），当触发错误的调用前面带有@时，它将返回0。 。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to dump the contents of a file to the output buffer, without first modifying it or seeking to a particular offset, you may want to use the readfile(), which saves you the fopen() call.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想将文件的内容转储到输出缓冲区中，而不先对其进行修改或寻求特定的偏移量，则可能需要使用readfile（），这样可以节省fopen（）调用。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to dump the contents of a file to the output buffer, without first modifying it or seeking to a particular offset, you may want to use the readgzfile() function, which saves you the gzopen() call.
trans-unit.target: 如果只想将文件的内容转储到输出缓冲区中，而不先对其进行修改或寻求特定的偏移量，则可能需要使用readgzfile（）函数，该函数可以节省gzopen（）调用。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to get the contents of a file into a string, use file_get_contents() as it has much better performance than the code above.
trans-unit.target: 如果只想将文件的内容转换为字符串，请使用file_get_contents（），因为它的性能比上面的代码好得多。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call a stored procedure using INOUT or OUT parameters, the recommended workaround is to use a native extension for your database (for example, mssql for MS SQL Server, or oci8 for Oracle).
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要使用INOUT或OUT参数调用存储过程，建议的解决方法是对数据库使用本机扩展（例如，对于MS SQL Server 为mssql，对于Oracle为oci8）。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call a stored procedure using INOUT or OUT parameters, the recommended workaround is to use a native extension for your database (for example, oci8 for Oracle).
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用INOUT或OUT参数调用存储过程，建议的解决方法是对数据库使用本机扩展（例如，oci8 for Oracle）。

trans-unit.source: If you need to execute a command and have all the data from the command passed directly back without any interference, use the passthru() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要执行命令并直接将命令中的所有数据传回而不会受到任何干扰，请使用passthru（）函数。

trans-unit.source: If you need to get additional error information from failed pg_query() queries, use pg_set_error_verbosity() and pg_last_error() and then parse the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要从失败的pg_query（）查询中获取其他错误信息，请使用pg_set_error_verbosity（）和pg_last_error（），然后解析结果。

trans-unit.source: If you need to know the number of nodes in the collection, use the length property of the DOMNodeList object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要知道集合中节点的数量，请使用DOMNodeList对象的 length 属性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to know the number of nodes in the collection, use the length property of the DOMNodeList object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要知道集合中节点的数量，请使用DOMNodeList对象的length属性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to set a timeout for reading/writing data over the socket, use stream_set_timeout(), as the timeout parameter to fsockopen() only applies while connecting the socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要设置超时以通过套接字读取/写入数据，请使用stream_set_timeout（），因为fsockopen（）的 timeout 参数仅在连接套接字时适用。

trans-unit.source: If you need to unserialize externally-stored serialized data, consider using hash_hmac() for data validation. Make sure data is not modified by anyone but you.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要取消序列化外部存储的序列化数据，请考虑使用hash_hmac（）进行数据验证。确保除了您之外，任何人都不会修改数据。

trans-unit.source: If you only need a uni-directional (one-way) process pipe, use popen() instead, as it is much easier to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果只需要单向（单向）过程管道，请改用popen（），因为它更易于使用。

trans-unit.source: If you only want to determine if a particular needle occurs within haystack, use the faster and less memory intensive function strpos() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果只想确定 haystack 是否发生了特定的 needle ，请改用速度更快且占用较少内存的函数strpos（）。

trans-unit.source: If you only want to duplicate the anonymous functions, you can use cloning instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果只想复制匿名函数，则可以改用克隆。

trans-unit.source: If you open a cursor for a prepared statement, mysqli_stmt_store_result() is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果为准备好的语句打开游标，则不需要mysqli_stmt_store_result（）。

trans-unit.source: If you opened the writer in memory, this function returns the generated XML buffer, Else, if using URI, this function will write the buffer and return the number of written bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在内存中打开写入器,这个函数返回生成的XML缓冲区,Else,如果使用URI,这个函数将写入缓冲区并返回写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: If you read/write to a socket returns in the arrays be aware that they do not necessarily read/write the full amount of data you have requested. Be prepared to even only be able to read/write a single byte.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对数组中的套接字返回进行读/写,要注意它们不一定能读/写你所请求的全部数据量。要做好甚至只能读/写一个字节的准备。

trans-unit.source: If you read/write to a stream returned in the arrays be aware that they do not necessarily read/write the full amount of data you have requested. Be prepared to even only be able to read/write a single byte.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对数组中返回的流进行读/写,请注意它们不一定能读/写你所请求的全部数据。甚至要做好只能读/写一个字节的准备。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the 't' flag when working with binary files, you may experience strange problems with your data, including broken image files and strange problems with \r\n characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理二进制文件时指定了“ t”标志，则数据可能会遇到奇怪的问题，包括损坏的图像文件和带有 \r\n 字符的奇怪问题。

trans-unit.source: If you still have register_globals and it is turned on, if you use extract() on $_FILES and specify EXTR_SKIP, you may be surprised at the results.
trans-unit.target: 如果仍然具有register_globals且已打开，则如果在 $_FILES 上使用extract（）并指定 EXTR_SKIP ，则可能会对结果感到惊讶。

trans-unit.target: 如果使用mysqli_stmt_store_result（），则可以立即调用mysqli_stmt_num_rows（）。

trans-unit.source: If you use MYSQLI_USE_RESULT all subsequent calls will return error Commands out of sync unless you call mysqli_free_result()
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 MYSQLI_USE_RESULT ,则所有后续调用都将返回错误 Commands out of sync 除非您调用mysqli_free_result（）

trans-unit.source: If you use a ini configuration file as your applicatioin's config container. you would open the yaf.cache_config to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用ini配置文件作为应用程序的配置容器。您可以打开yaf.cache_config来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If you use a ini configuration file as your applicatioin's config container. you would open the yaf.cache_config to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用ini配置文件作为应用程序的配置容器。您可以打开yaf.cache_config来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If you use an undefined constant, PHP assumes that you mean the name of the constant itself, just as if you called it as a string (CONSTANT vs "CONSTANT"). An error of level E_NOTICE will be issued when this happens. See also the manual entry on why $foo[bar] is wrong (unless you first define()bar as a constant). This does not apply to (fully) qualified constants, which will raise a fatal error if undefined. If you simply want to check if a constant is set, use the defined() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用未定义的常量，则PHP会假设您是在指常量本身的名称，就像您将其称为字符串一样（CONSTANT与“ CONSTANT”）。发生这种情况时，将发出E_NOTICE级错误。另请参见有关$ foo [bar]为什么错误的手册（除非您首先将bar作为常量定义）。这不适用于（完全）限定常量，如果未定义，则将引发致命错误。如果只想检查是否设置了常量，请使用define（）函数。

trans-unit.source: If you use the MYSQLI_STMT_ATTR_CURSOR_TYPE option with MYSQLI_CURSOR_TYPE_READ_ONLY, a cursor is opened for the statement when you invoke mysqli_stmt_execute(). If there is already an open cursor from a previous mysqli_stmt_execute() call, it closes the cursor before opening a new one. mysqli_stmt_reset() also closes any open cursor before preparing the statement for re-execution. mysqli_stmt_free_result() closes any open cursor.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 MYSQLI_STMT_ATTR_CURSOR_TYPE 选项与 MYSQLI_CURSOR_TYPE_READ_ONLY 一起使用，则在调用mysqli_stmt_execute（）时将为该语句打开一个游标。如果先前的mysqli_stmt_execute（）调用中已经存在一个打开的游标，则在打开新游标之前，它会关闭游标。在准备重新执行语句之前，mysqli_stmt_reset（）也关闭所有打开的游标。mysqli_stmt_free_result（）关闭所有打开的游标。

trans-unit.source: If you use the MYSQLI_STMT_ATTR_CURSOR_TYPE option with MYSQLI_CURSOR_TYPE_READ_ONLY, a cursor is opened for the statement when you invoke mysqli_stmt_execute(). If there is already an open cursor from a previous mysqli_stmt_execute() call, it closes the cursor before opening a new one. mysqli_stmt_reset() also closes any open cursor before preparing the statement for re-execution. mysqli_stmt_free_result() closes any open cursor.
trans-unit.target: 如果将MYSQLI_STMT_ATTR_CURSOR_TYPE选项与MYSQLI_CURSOR_TYPE_READ_ONLY一起使用，则在调用mysqli_stmt_execute（）时将为该语句打开一个游标。如果先前的mysqli_stmt_execute（）调用中已经存在一个打开的游标，则在打开新游标之前，它将关闭游标。mysqli_stmt_reset（）在准备重新执行语句之前，还会关闭所有打开的游标。mysqli_stmt_free_result（）关闭所有打开的游标。

trans-unit.source: If you use the wrong line ending characters when writing your files, you might find that other applications that open those files will "look funny".
trans-unit.target: 如果你在编写文件时使用了错误的行尾字符,你可能会发现打开这些文件的其他应用程序会 "看起来很有趣"。

trans-unit.target: 如果在多个数据库上使用事务，则必须在对ibase_query（）和ibase_prepare（）的调用中同时指定 link_id 和 transaction_id 。

trans-unit.target: 如果要Yaf_Loader在本地类目录（在application.ini中定义，默认情况下为application.directory .//library）中搜索某些类（库），则应使用Yaf_Loader注册类前缀： ：registerLocalNameSpace（）

trans-unit.target: 如果希望提示用户保存要发送的数据（例如生成的PDF文件），则可以使用»Content-Disposition标头提供推荐的文件名，并强制浏览器显示保存对话框。
